resources.string: Here are some of your goals,
It looks like you haven\'t set any goals. Consider pressing \"Set Goals\" to begin creating some goals.
Goods news, you have goals to reflect on!
Time to reflect on your goals!
Reflection on your goals is an important part of accomplishing them.
The time of day that you will be prompted to complete your goal reflections.

Answer the following questions to reflect on this goal. \n\nWhen answering, try to reflect on your day as a whole to have more valuable responses. More valuable answers will help you reach your goal! If you\'re struggling, take some time to think without any distractions."
There are no goals to reflect on
I made progress on this goal

Why did you agree/disagree with that statement? What may have prevented you from making progress? Or, what helped you make progress? Think about what you may have done correctly or any mistakes you may have made.
e.g. I agree because my goal is to read more, so I started out by replacing 15 minutes of my screen time with reading.
I could do more to accomplish this goal
Why did you agree/disagree with that statement? Is there something in your life preventing you from making progress on this goal? Are you already putting your best foot forward to reach this goal?
e.g. I agree because I could replace more screen time with reading.
Think about all of your previous answers

What actions will you take, change, or continue to reach this goal. What are you currently doing right? What mistakes could you fix, if any? If you\'re struggling, consider if this goal has a reasonable time frame, is not too broad, and is currently realistic.
e.g. I will replace 10 more minutes of screen time with reading.
Are you sure you want to exit this reflection? Any responses will not be saved.
You have reached the end of the reflection!
Once you have answered all the questions, you may finish the reflection. You will NOT be able to edit your responses after completing the reflection - this is intentional.
